alert.note: Alert for Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 2:02PM EST until December 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze and snow of an inch or less. * WHERE...Somerset County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The hazard we wish to highlight with this advisory is the possibility of a glaze of ice in the morning. The snow accumulation will be of little to no significance for Somerset County tonight and Sunday morning.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions.
